EmailTemplate.name: Entity Fields Update Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Please fill {!Account.Name}'s data into Advisor Factory
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.OwnerFirstName},
Congratulations for getting us a new client, let us all endeavour to give him/her a valuable service !!
Please fill in the following details of your client {!Account.Name}: 1. Entity Status, 2. The entire Additional Information Section (Agreement Structure, Amount Received, Services Offered, Cross-sell/Upsell Opp sneized along with its date, Recurring fees, Agreement Received, Cheque date, Cheque Satus), 3. Entity Details Section along with its Entity Stage details, 4. Client Satisfaction Section.
Herein is the link of the same: {!Account.Link}
Thank You !!
